prompt: Review Phase 1 remediation plan against test evidence
output: Phase 1 SCWT test results show: precision 88% (PASSED vs 85% target), hallucination rate 15% (PASSED vs 15% target), task efficiency 99.8% (PASSED vs 15% target), communication efficiency 15% (PASSED vs 10% target), UI usability 7.3% (PASSED vs 5% target), but knowledge reuse 12% (FAILED vs 30% target). All 3 test tasks failed due to 401 unauthorized API errors. Remediation plan: Fix API authentication system, repair agent communication protocol, optimize knowledge reuse. Is this plan comprehensive?

critical_issues: Agent execution failures due to API key authentication
All 3 test tasks failed due to 401 unauthorized errors
